titles: A compendyouse somme of the very Christen relygyon gathered faythfully out of holy scripture: necessary for all them that rede the olde and new Testament. Tra[n]slated by George Joye the yere of our lorde. M.D.xxxv. in Septembre.
author: Joye, George, d. 1553.
publisher: in Fletestrete by John Byddell dwellyng at the sygne of the Sonne,
notes: A translation, by George Joye, of: Summa totius sacrae scripturae.
Reproduction of the original in the Marsh's Library.
